definition: to hold by the hand/fig. to nurture/to foster/to bring up/to support
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to raise/to lift/to take along (e.g. one's family)

sentences.english: The soul aids the body, and at certain moments, raises it.
sentences.chinese: 靈魂扶助肉體，某些時刻甚至還能提挈它。

definition: to be too petty or insignificant to mention/to not be worth mentioning (idiom)
to lie prostrate/to prostrate oneself (in veneration)
lit. holy scripture and biography of sage (idiom); refers to Confucian canonical texts
variant of 連貫|连贯[lian2 guan4]
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
to depend ultimately on (Tw)/absolutely reliant on
